titles.title: Protect Pregnant Women and Children from Dangerous Lead Exposures Act of 2008
An original bill to protect pregnant women and children from dangerous lead exposures.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Boxer. With written report No. 110-515. Additional views filed.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1097.
